00 000 111 000 000 00000//ADD
00 000 001 000 000 00000//ADD
01 010 011 001 00010100//SUBI [LOOP]
101 00 000000 00000110//BZ [PC + 1 +disp(6)] = [END]
100 00 010 001 01100100//LDM
00 010 011 111 010 00000//SUB
101 11 000000 00000001//JNC ?==BNC [PC + 1 + disp()] = [L1]
00 000 111 010 000 00000//ADD
01 000 001 001 00000001//ADDI [L1]
11100 00 000000000010//JMP [\LOOP]
0000000000000000000// [END]
